name: Marketplace
content: Users can buy and sell SBC-NFTs on the Marketplace.

name: Walk To Earn
content: If you have an SBC-NFT, You can earn SBC tokens by walking

name: Ride To Earn
content: You will get extra SBC tokens when cycling

name: Auction
content: SBC will offer weekly auctions of limited items every Sunday!

name: NFT Staking
content: Earn passive income with your SBC-NFTs.
